pageContext.claim: “A new Rasmussen poll just came out just a very short while ago, and it has our approval rating at 55 percent and going up.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has a tendency to focus only on polls that are good for him. Rasmussen has a right-leaning bias and earns a C+ grade from FiveThirtyEight.com. Other polls show Trump with significantly lower approval ratings, such as Gallup (40 percent) and the Pew Research Center (39 percent).
